text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/us-core-category defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
sdoh SDOHSocial Determinants of Health category
functional-status Functional StatusFunctional Status category
disability-status Disability StatusDisability Status category
cognitive-status Cognitive StatusCognitive Status category

name: USCoreCategory
title: US Core Category
description: Category codes used across US Core Profiles and resource types. They are typically used when there is a need for categorization for searching and finding resources or workflow hints.
